remarks: The quadratic equation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
statement:
quad.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
quad.z $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
quad.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
quad.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
quad.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
quad.d $e |- ( ph -> D = ( ( B ^ 2 ) - ( 4 x. ( A x. C ) ) ) ) $.
quad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A x. ( X ^ 2 ) ) + ( ( B x. X ) + C ) ) = 0 <-> ( X = ( ( -u B + ( sqrt ` D ) ) / ( 2 x. A ) ) \/ X = ( ( -u B - ( sqrt ` D ) ) / ( 2 x. A ) ) ) ) ) $.
